subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
College Athletics
Deaths (Fatalities)
Football (College)
Football
lead_paragraph: Oxycodone toxicity and degenerative brain disease were found in an autopsy of Cullen Finnerty, who played for Grand Valley State University.
